text: “Mapemphero awo m’menemo adzakhala kunena: “Subuhanaka Lahuma’ Ulemelero ndi Wanu, E Inu Allah!” Ndipo kulonjerana kwawo m’menemo kudzakhala kunena: “Salaam (alayikum’) Mtendere (ukhale pa inu).” Ndipo duwa yawo yomaliza (idzakhala kuyamika ponena kuti) “Alham’du Lillah Rabil a’lamin’. Kuyamikidwa konse nkwa Allah Mbuye wa zolengedwa.”
